item.title: Using R Markdown for recurring Reports
item.description: In this post I will show you some of my best practises for using R Markdown for reporting. We will cover How to create beautiful tables with conditional formating with kableExtra How to include your results in the (Markdown) text How to include global variables. Create beautiful tables with kableExtra kableExtra is a nice library that allows you to format and style your tables. It workds similar to ggplot2: You create a base table and then add formating layers with the pipe operator %>%.

item.title: R Markdown for Novices: All you need to know to get started
item.description: I write this blogpost for someone, who has never worked with R Markdown. After you read this post, you will understand why R Markdown may be useful for your daily work as a student, researcher, analyst or data scientist. understand the basic structure of an R Markdown document and how you can get startet. I strongly encourage everybody working with R to use R Markdown. I promise, it will make your life so much easier.
